# WEAPON::HIDE_PED_WEAPON_FOR_SCRIPTED_CUTSCENE

## Summary
Hide a characters weapons while playing a scripted cutscene

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** hideWeaponFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Hides the players weapon during a cutscene.
